title: Ralph Sampson MC
desc: The new Ralph Sampson MC is PUMA’s modern take on a classic, preserving key elements of the original design. This version draws inspiration from the clean, minimal style of Scandinavian design, featuring neutral tones, a leather upper, and suede overlays for a refined, contemporary look.

title: Jada Renew
desc: Jada Renew blends tennis-inspired style with everyday comfort. Designed with a slightly elevated profile for a retro vibe, they feature a mix of durable leather materials for long-lasting wear. A SOFTFOAM+ sockliner delivers cushioned support underfoot, keeping you comfortable with every step.

title: Air Max 1 x Patta Chlorophyll
desc: Celebrate two decades of Patta with the Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary 'Chlorophyll', released in 2024. This special edition nods to the iconic 5th anniversary version from 2009, blending heritage and fresh style in a tribute to the brand’s legacy.

title: Air Max 1 Ultra Moire
desc: The Air Max 1 Ultra Moire sports a Summit White leather upper with laser-etched perforations for a sleek, breathable look. Gym Red accents highlight the midsole, cut-off side Swoosh, and tongue and heel branding, adding a bold contrast to the clean design.

title: Air Max 95 Premium
desc: The Nike Air Max 95 Premium gets a modern refresh with a bold mix of materials and colours. Released in May 2019, this edition features an upper made of Oil Grey suede, teal chenille, and beige canvas, accented by a multicoloured tongue patch for a standout look.

title: New Balance 997
desc: The 997H is a modern evolution of the classic 997, reimagined for those who want to stand out. With bold updates and a streamlined design, it brings a fresh take on a ‘90s icon while staying true to its lasting heritage.

title: Air Jordan 1 Mid
desc: Inspired by the original AJ1, this mid-top version keeps the classic look while using select colors and smooth leather to create a unique style.

title: Adidas Originals Continental 80
desc: The Continental 80 draws from retro '80s tennis style, featuring a low-top design with a two-tone stripe and a logo window near the laces. Its split rubber cupsole with an EVA insert offers comfort and flexibility.

title: Adidas POD S3.1
desc: The adidas P.O.D. S3.1 features a sock-like upper with Three Stripe branding, a hybrid midsole with Boost and EVA cushioning, and a durable rubber outsole. Finished with a suede heel tab and Trefoil branding, it blends classic and modern design.

title: New Balance XC-72
desc: The XC-72 takes inspiration from 1970s concept cars, blending classic design with futuristic elements. Featuring angular details and unique traction patterns, it reimagines the sleek low-cut style of vintage running shoes with a bold, experimental twist.
